name: The Free State
startIntroPart1: 'When plunder becomes a way of life for a group of men in a society, over the course of time they create for themselves a legal system that authorizes it and a moral code that glorifies it.' - Frédéric Bastiat
startIntroPart2: 'The world, viewed philosophically, remains a series of slave camps, where citizens – tax livestock – labor under the chains of illusion in the service of their masters.' - Stefan Molyneux
declaringWar: Let's try to be non agressive!
uniqueName: The non state of the free people
uniques: +30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [-60]
[non-air] units gain the [Breach the Walls] promotion
[Melee] units gain the [Eat the Living] promotion
